text:
*This dosen't seem right!*
Hem, _column-width_ and _divider-width_ at the same time in the same object?!

Cope Example:
```{% dnd_section vertical_alignment='MIDDLE', max_width='{{ max }}' %}
    {% dnd_module "divider" path="@HubSpot/divider", offset=0, width=12, label="Logo Divider",
       height="{{ divider.height }}",
       color="{{ divider.color }}",
       line_type="{{ divider.line_type }}",
       alignment="{{ divider.alignment }}",
       show_padding="{{ divider.show_padding }}",
       padding="{{ divider.padding }}"
     %}
      {% module_attribute 'width', is_json=true %}"{{ divider.width }}"{% end_module_attribute %}
    {% end_dnd_module %}
{% end_dnd_section %}```
Otherwise, _width_ was _duplicated_ and create an error. *But seem width does't work anyway!*
Hey everyone! I need to add extra field for blog post picture. How do I add it? Im working with the cli tool.
